meanings.definition: An aquatic arthropod of the class Crustacea, typically having a hard exoskeleton and jointed limbs.
meanings.sent1: The crustacean scuttled along the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a colorful crustacean crawling on the rocks by the shore.
meanings.sent3: The crustacean wore a tiny top hat and danced under the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her armor was as tough as a crustacean's exoskeleton.
meanings.sent5: The children marveled at the intricate patterns on the crustacean's shell.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is hard or inflexible.
meanings.sent1: The old man was a crustacean when it came to changing his routine.
meanings.sent2: The stubborn old tree stood like a crustacean against the wind.
meanings.sent3: The rusty lock on the gate was a real crustacean, refusing to budge.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a crustacean, hardened by years of disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins were as unyielding as a crustacean in the face of time.
